snippet.title: Escape The Pacific - Seamless Approach
snippet.description:
The seamless approach is another advantage of our game engine. In clear air conditions the islands are visible from long distances. As the player approaches them, there is no popping in or out of island objects.

This seamless approach and the longer visibility range gives bigger immersion to players, as they see many islands also from greater distances. The islands are tempting the player to travel to them, but the player knows they are reachable only by cost of longer time and greater effort.

For more information see: https://gamers4gamersteam.com/lost-in-pacific/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/G4GTeam
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Gamers4GamersTeam
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/lost-in-pacific

We will upload more videos about other game features soon.
